properties.name: HeaderPanel
properties.headerText: Asset Disposal Form

properties.name: richtext_label_4
properties.text: Please select the first manager/supervisor that needs to approve this Asset Disposal Request. The person you specify will have the option of adding additional approvers to the approval chain.
properties.textTranslation: Please select the first manager/supervisor that needs to approve this Asset Disposal Request. The person you specify will have the option of adding additional approvers to the approval chain.

properties.name: richtext_label_5
properties.text: Use the CC field to notify an interested party when this Asset Disposal Request is Approved or Rejected.
properties.textTranslation: Use the CC field to notify an interested party when this Asset Disposal Request is Approved or Rejected.

properties.textTranslation: *For Transferred assets, the transcation price will be same as written down value.
